title: Mr.Time : Metallic Blue
developerAddress: 2F, J Studio, 28, Donggyo-ro 25-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 03993
description: *This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps. This watch is called 'Metallic Blue'.[Mr.Time Watchface Series]We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.More different designs will be updated constantly.*Tap : watch theme change
descriptionHTML:
*This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps.

This watch is called 'Metallic Blue'.

[Mr.Time Watchface Series]
We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.
More different designs will be updated constantly.

*Tap : watch theme change
comments: Could be better I like the design but I wish they were Roman numerals instead of standard 1-12 numbers around the dial . Also for some reason the face will turn white out of nowhere. I bought it for the blue dial I hate that it turns white on me.
Slight delay when screen comes on? Maybe it's just me, but on the Huawei watch there is a slight delay whenever activating the display. The hands have to catch up. Kind of annoying.
- 1001 NO WORK ON GEAR 2 with NOTE 4... REFUND MY MONEY, OR I KILL YOU!
Is this available for Motorola v2? It doesn't show up on my watchface list in Android Wear after I installed it?
